name: Asteroid Shooter (jamestgamedesign)
description: Asteroid Shooter is a VR Shooter. Player need defend the base from the falling asteroids. This is a solo project, game is created in Unity Game Engine. I used Steam plugin and Art Asset from Unity Store. I scripted all mechanic and create the VFX. The demo include one playable level. Game is in Unity window executable , HTC Vive is need to experience this game demo.
